mapper.select: SELECT acc.USERNAME, acc.NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, role.ID, role.NAME ROLE_NAME FROM ACCOUNT acc JOIN (SELECT ID, USERNAME, NAME FROM ACCOUNT_ROLE acc JOIN ROLE role ON acc.ROLE_ID = role.id) as role ON acc.USERNAME = role.USERNAME WHERE acc.USERNAME = #{username}
